alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 8:42AM CST until February 28 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Flooding continues on the Black Warrior River and a flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by this evening, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY EVENING TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...From Thursday evening to early Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 88.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow evening to a crest of 92.2 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
